changeSet.author: mcpierce
changeSet.createView: SELECT d.comic_book_id, d.id AS comic_detail_id, d.filename, d.archive_type, d.publisher, d.imprint, d.series, d.volume, d.issue_number, d.title, d.cover_date, d.store_date, CASE WHEN EXISTS(SELECT * FROM comic_metadata_sources s WHERE s.comic_book_id = d.comic_book_id) THEN true ELSE false END AS is_scraped FROM comic_details d WHERE d.comic_book_id IN (SELECT id FROM comic_books WHERE organizing IS TRUE)
